name: Ext_R5_ProductShelfLife_period
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.ProductShelfLife.period[x] for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents ProductShelfLife.period[x] from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ProductShelfLife|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: The shelf life time period can be specified using a numerical value for the period of time and its unit of time measurement The unit of measurement shall be specified in accordance with ISO 11240 and the resulting terminology The symbol and the symbol identifier shall be used
element.definition: `ProductShelfLife.period[x]` maps to R4B `ProductShelfLife.period`. Type `string` has no mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
